page.title: 09HARLOW HOSPITAL AND CLINICS
page.content: {Princess Alexandra Hospital}is the main health centre in Harlow.There are specialists for broken bones, child - care and Pharmacology.There are 40 other specialists that visit 2 or 3 times a week to hold a one day clinic. The hospital employs 400 nurses and 45 doctors. {Addison House}near to the hospital is one of the 6 health centres in Harlow, which is the only town in West Essex where doctors are not allowed to practise in their own homes but must use a health centre.There are 46 staff. Harlow's health centres belonged to the{Nuffield Trust.}But in 1984 they were sold to the local council.All the health centres in Harlow are managed from{Parndon Hall.}
